bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Use of Dissolved Gas Analysis Applied to Factory Temperature Rise Tests for the Evaluation of Mineral Oil-Immersed Transformers and Reactors
IEEE Draft Guide for the Use of Dissolved Gas Analysis Applied to Factory Temperature Rise Tests for the Evaluation of Mineral Oil-Immersed Transformers and Reactors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide is intended for the application of dissolved gas analysis (DGA) techniques on oil-immersed transformers and reactors applied during factory temperature rise tests. It contains recommended procedures for sampling, recommended actions based on interpretation of results, and a bibliography of related literature.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
